name: Racing OSM Style 3
description: Forever Cool! An amazingly fun and original American muscle-car multi-level racing game. This highly competitive muscle car game features a sliding accelerator pedal for more power and better control when you need it. Feel the power while you see the performance as the throttle is right at your fingertips. Win races to unlock next level engine packages with speeds ranging from 120 to 190 MPH. Also, get up to a 30 MPH increase above the top speed for your car when you use Nitrous!  Holds three car profiles for each vehicle. Includes five superb legendary classics: Camaro SS/RS; Charger Daytona; Dodge Charger; Plymouth Road Runner and Shelby GT 500E. Unique to these vehicles is that we've used the built-in horsepower checker to build the throttle system around the horsepower produced. Also unique to this gaming application is that there are actually running engine blocks underneath the hood. From beautiful cars and city streets to great engine sounds, your are guaranteed to have loads of fun!
